data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Throw-in Valladolid.
In the minute 2, Real Madrid have a dangerous throw-in.
Valladolid needs to be cautious. Real Madrid have an attacking throw-in.
In Madrid, Valladolid push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 5, Real Madrid have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Throw-in for Valladolid in the half of Real Madrid.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 6, Valladolid pushes forward through Shon Weissman, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Real Madrid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Federico Valverde for Real Madrid drives towards goal at Santiago Bernabeu. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 11, Corner awarded to Real Madrid.
Can Real Madrid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valladolid's half?
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Corner awarded to Valladolid.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Real Madrid in their own half.
In the minute 16, Cesar Soto Grado awards Valladolid a goal kick.
In Madrid Real Madrid attack through Luka Jovic. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 18, Cesar Soto Grado signals a Real Madrid throw-in in Valladolid's half.
Goal kick for Valladolid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Karim Benzema for Real Madrid is whistled offside.
In the minute 22, Valladolid to take a throw-in in Real Madrid territory.
Valladolid have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Valladolid is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 24, Throw-in for Real Madrid in the half of Valladolid.
Valladolid awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 25, Can Real Madrid capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Throw-in for Real Madrid close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Valladolid goal kick.
In the minute 27, Cesar Soto Grado awards the home team a throw-in.
Cesar Soto Grado awards Real Madrid a goal kick.
Real Madrid to take a throw-in in Valladolid territory.
In the minute 30, Throw-in for Valladolid in their own half.
Valladolid have been awarded a corner by Cesar Soto Grado.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a free kick to Valladolid.
In the minute 34, Oscar Plano (Valladolid) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Valladolid capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Real Madrid's half?
Real Madrid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 35, Real Madrid are coming forward and Luka Jovic gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Valladolid at Santiago Bernabeu.
Can Valladolid get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Real Madrid's half?
In the minute 37, Fabian Orellana of Valladolid smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Valladolid.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a Valladolid throw-in in Real Madrid's half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Real Madrid in their own half.
Karim Benzema of Real Madrid gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
In the minute 42, Valladolid are pushing forward but Waldo Rubio's finish is wide of the goal.
Real Madrid have a goal kick.
Valladolid awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Free kick Valladolid.
Cesar Soto Grado signals a throw-in for Real Madrid, close to Valladolid's area.
The first-half is over.
